title: Design and Implementation of VR-Based Open Mathematics Classes at Scale

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics pedagogy and experience utilizing digital tools
context.additional_context: Professional development for elementary school teachers to enhance their capacity to design math lessons using open educational resources (OER) in VR environments, emphasizing collaborative learning and real-time feedback structures through constructivist and network-based pedagogies

learning_goals: Learners can create VR-based math lesson designs utilizing Open Educational Resources (OER).
Learners can plan math problem-solving activities using Learner-Generated Content (LGC) in digital environments.
Learners can share lesson materials with peer teachers and derive improvements through a network-based feedback system.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
